name: Create, Update, Delete and Fetch user information

testSteps.description: Create, Update, Delete and Fetch user information #1: {userData=20,testuser,firstname,lastname,testuser@gmail.com,test123,123456789,0, firstname=pet, lastname=store, email=petstore@gmail.com, changepassword=test1234, phoneNumber=987654321, userName=testuser}

exception.message:
The following 6 assertions failed:
1) expected:<[19]L> but was:<[20]L>
at UserStepDefn.allow_to_fetch_the_user_details_by(UserStepDefn.java:68) expected:<[19]L> but was:<[20]L>
2) expected:<null> but was:<"firstname">
at LoginAPISteps.compareUserInfo(LoginAPISteps.java:120) expected:<null> but was:<"firstname">
3) expected:<null> but was:<"lastname">
at LoginAPISteps.compareUserInfo(LoginAPISteps.java:121) expected:<null> but was:<"lastname">
4) expected:<"test[.user@testing].com"> but was:<"test[user@gmail].com">
at LoginAPISteps.compareUserInfo(LoginAPISteps.java:122) expected:<"test[.user@testing].com"> but was:<"test[user@gmail].com">
5) expected:<"[password]123"> but was:<"[test]123">
at LoginAPISteps.compareUserInfo(LoginAPISteps.java:123) expected:<"[password]123"> but was:<"[test]123">
6) expected:<"[07898889878]"> but was:<"[123456789]">
at LoginAPISteps.compareUserInfo(LoginAPISteps.java:124) expected:<"[07898889878]"> but was:<"[123456789]">

children.description: Create user class: [20, testuser, firstname, lastname, testuser@gmail.com, test123, 123456789, 0]
When I send request to crete user
And Allow to fetch the user details by "testuser"
And Allow to updated the First name "pet" where Username "testuser"
And Allow to updated the Last name "store" where Username "testuser"
And Allow to updated the Email "petstore@gmail.com" where Username "testuser"
And Allow to updated password "test1234" where Username "testuser"
And Allow to updated phone number "987654321" where Username "testuser"
And Delete the user with username "testuser"

userStory.narrative: I login to application and I should be able to create new user, update existing user information and delete the user

title: Create, Update, Delete and Fetch user information

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I provide login information "<userData>"
When I send request to crete user
Then Create user is successful
And Allow to fetch the user details by "<userName>"
And Allow to updated the First name "<firstname>" where Username "<userName>"
And Allow to updated the Last name "<lastname>" where Username "<userName>"
And Allow to updated the Email "<email>" where Username "<userName>"
And Allow to updated password "<changepassword>" where Username "<userName>"
And Allow to updated phone number "<phoneNumber>" where Username "<userName>"
And Delete the user with username "<userName>"
